H0.text: what is the name of the currency used in china. Yuan

H1.text: what is the name of the currency used in china. Chinese Dollar

H2.text: what is the name of the currency used in china. Dragon Dollar

H3.text: what is the name of the currency used in china. Renminbi

A4.text: Renminbi is the name of the currency while yuan is the name of the primary unit of the renminbi.

A5.text: The renminbi is the official currency of China.
